questions.answer: 10/23/25, 1:49 AM Frequently asked questions - RMIT University https://www.rmit.edu.au/study-with-us/applying-to-rmit/frequently-asked-questions?utm_source=chatgpt.com#program-and-course-information 1/9 To fnd out f a program s avaabe for nternatona students ntendng to obtan a study vsa seect "Student type Internatona" n the nformaton summary at the top of the program page Some programs are avaabe for nternatona students through onne study ony whch do not quafy for an Austraan study vsa If ths s the case t w be noted on the program page Informaton about program duraton can be found n the nformaton summary at the top of the program page Some programs may ncude If a program does ncude partcuar requrements they w be noted under the Admssons secton of a program page ncudng Inherent requrements and Addtona nformaton Opportuntes for credt advanced standng and recognton of pror earnng can be found under Pathways on the program page or wthn RMIT's Admsson and Credt Pocy (https//pocesrmteduau/) If you are undertakng a snge course whch provdes credt to a partcuar program or offerng you can fnd out about ths under Pathways on the program page If a program has been CRICOS-approved the CRICOS code w be noted on the program page and the program pan If a key contact s avaabe for a program t w be noted under Key contacts n the Detas secton of the program page If a key contact s not avaabe for a program reach out to Study@RMIT (/contact/contact-us) for more nformaton

questions.answer: What is the application process?10/23/25, 1:49 AM Frequently asked questions - RMIT University https://www.rmit.edu.au/study-with-us/applying-to-rmit/frequently-asked-questions?utm_source=chatgpt.com#program-and-course-information 2/9 The process for appyng to a course at RMIT vares by eve of study and f you're a oca or nternatona student Ready to appy RMIT’s standard cosng date for recevng appcatons vary by eve of study each ntake Pease note some courses have ther own cosng date and enroments are subect to paces and avaabty As such appcants are encouraged to appy as soon as possbe Internatona students are aso strongy advsed to appy by the dates recommended for ther country/regon These maybe earer than the cosng date for your course and are based on antcpated vsa processng tmes for each country If you requre a student vsa you w aso need to aow addtona tme to appy for your vsa For further nformaton contact us (/contact) Fnd out about student and ATAR profes on the Admssons transparency page (/study-wth-us/appyng-to-rmt/oca-student- appcatons/entry-requrements/admssons-transparency) Ths nformaton can be found under Admssons on a program page Learn about RMIT's Indgenous Access Program (/students/student-fe/sport-ftness/ete-athete-program) Fnd out about RMIT's Equty access schemes (/study-wth-us/appyng-to-rmt/oca-student-appcatons/equty-access- schemes) Learn about RMIT's Ete and Emergng Athete programs (/students/student-fe/sport-ftness/ete-athete-program) The Vctoran Tertary Admssons Centre VTAC) s a hub for tertary course appcatons n Vctora VTAC receves processes and forwards course appcatons to unverstes TAFEs and ndependent tertary coeges n Vctora (and a few outsde Vctora) VTAC does not decde who gets nto a course A decsons about whch appcants are offered a pace are made byFnd out how to appy to RMIT as a oca student (/study-wth-us/appyng-to-rmt/oca-student-appcatons) Fnd out how to appy to RMIT as an nternatona student (/study-wth-us/nternatona-students/appy-to-rmt- nternatona-students) Loca student appcaton dates (/study-wth-us/appyng-to-rmt/oca-student-appcatons/appcaton-dates) Internatona student appcaton deadnes (/study-wth-us/nternatona-students/appy-to-rmt-nternatona- students/appcaton-dates)

questions.answer: When do I pay my fees?10/23/25, 1:49 AM Frequently asked questions - RMIT University https://www.rmit.edu.au/study-with-us/applying-to-rmit/frequently-asked-questions?utm_source=chatgpt.com#program-and-course-information 4/9 Tuton fees and the Student Servces and Amentes Fee are payabe after the census date Fnd out census dates for Other fees and expenses throughout your study may ncude the SSAF (/study-wth-us/appyng-to-rmt/oca-student- appcatons/fees/student-servces-and-amentes-fee) and materas and admn fees (/study-wth-us/appyng-to-rmt/oca- student-appcatons/fees/other-expenses-matera-and-admn-fees) Lke a Austraan unverstes RMIT charges a Student Servces and Amentes Fee SSAF) to mprove your unversty experence To fnd out what actvtes and servces the SSAF funds vst the SSAF page (/study-wth-us/appyng-to-rmt/oca- student-appcatons/fees/student-servces-and-amentes-fee) To earn about refunds and fnd out f you're egbe for one vst our Refunds page (/students/my-course/fees-oans- payments/fee-refunds) Fnd out f you're egbe for a HELP or VET oan and how to appy for one and ensure you know about your responsbtes va the HELP Loans and VET Student Loans page (/students/my-course/fees-oans-payments/hep-oans-vs) Vst the Schoarshps page (/students/careers-opportuntes/schoarshps) to fnd out about schoarshps and grants that you may be egbe for To access fundng through the Vctoran Sks Frst Program ndvduas must be ookng to gan new sks or upgrade ther exstng quafcatons RMIT encourages ndvduas wth a dsabty to access Vocatona Educaton tranng subsdsed through the Vctoran government Sks Frst Program The Sks Frst program fundng s dependent on a range of egbty crtera (/study-wth-us/appyng-to-rmt/oca-student- appcatons/appy-by-eve-of-study/vocatona-appcatons/egbty-for-a-government-subsdsed-pace) If an ndvdua s egbe the government w contrbute to the costs of the tranng Student support and activitiesHgher educaton (/students/my-course/mportant-dates/census-date) Vocatona educaton (/students/my-course/mportant-dates/census-date) Assocate degrees (/students/my-course/mportant-dates/census-date)
